long_description: Designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts, the Yurbuds Venture Talk Earphones deliver comfort and a secure in-ear design that helps keep them in place when you're on the go. Patented twist lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing on sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Single-button microphone system seamlessly controls music tracks and voice calls on most smartphones. The Yurbuds Venture Talk Earphones feature flat Kevlar cords with a protective coating for water- and tangle-resistant durability.
short_description: Designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts, the Yurbuds Venture Talk Earphones deliver comfort and a secure in-ear design that helps keep them in place when you're on the go.
